meanings.meaning: 1. day; days この服は寒い冬の日には向かない。These clothes are not appropriate for a cold winter day.
2. sun; sunshine; sunlight この部屋はあまり日が当たらない。This room does not get much sun.
3. (the) day; daytime; daylight 冬が近づくにつれて日が短くなる。The days grow shorter as winter approaches.
4. date; deadline 会議の日を決めなさい。Fix a date for the meeting.
5. (past) days; time (e.g. of one's childhood) われわれは過ぎし日の事を、必ずしも愛情とは言えないまでも少なくとも一種の憧れを持ってふりかえるのである。We look back on days gone by, if not always with affections, at any rate with a kind of wistfulness.
6. case (esp. unfortunate); event as 〜した日には, 〜と来た日には, etc.
7. Hi
8. Day A day is a unit of time, commonly defined as an interval ... Read more

sentences.translation: These clothes are not appropriate for a cold winter day.
This room does not get much sun.
The days grow shorter as winter approaches.
Fix a date for the meeting.
We look back on days gone by, if not always with affections, at any rate with a kind of wistfulness.

日焼: Irregular okurigana usage. 陽焼け: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. cheerful; jovial; merry; lively Antonym: 陰気ナンシーはとても陽気でかわいらしい性格だ。Nancy has a very lively and sweet temperament.
2. weather; season 今日は汗ばむような陽気だ。It's warm enough today to bring out a slight sweat.
3. spirit of yang See also 陰気 いんき
